title: Trump says he hasn't considered pardoning Ghislaine Maxwell
shortDescription: Ghislaine Maxwell, an associate of Jeffrey Epstein, is meeting with federal prosecutors again on July 25.

title: 'We've been used as props': Veterans rally against Trump cuts
shortDescription: Veterans and protesters in Texas and Washington, D.C., rallied against the Trump administration's cuts to programs supporting veterans on the 81st anniversary of D-Day.

title: Expelled ex-congressman George Santos is off to prison
shortDescription: George Santos pleaded guilty in August 2024 to felony wire fraud and aggravated identity theft charges.

title: Trump says US will loosen rules in push to win AI race
shortDescription: The Trump administration released a new artificial intelligence blueprint that aims to loosen environmental rules and vastly expand AI exports to allies, in a bid to maintain the American edge over China in the critical technology.

title: Make gas cans great again: White House pushes for changes
shortDescription: Vapor-emissions regulations were ordered after scientists noted the approximately 80 million gas cans were a surprising source of air pollution.

title: Protests, UK prime minister await Trump during Scotland trip
shortDescription: Scotland is the birthplace of Trump’s mother and a place where he owns two golf resorts. Yet he hasn’t always had a warm reception there.

title: 'Terrific guy': Trump-Epstein party boy friendship lasted a decade
shortDescription: Donald Trump and Jeffrey Epstein were friends for decades. Why conspiracy theories about them now grow.

title: See Columbia's extraordinary $220 million deal with Trump
shortDescription: Columbia University announced a $220 million deal with the Trump administration. Here's what's in it.

title: Justice Kagan: Supreme Court should explain its rulings for Trump
shortDescription: Trump has racked up a nearly unbroken string of Supreme Court wins on emergency appeals. Justice Kagan said the court should explain those decisions.

title: Former Trump lawyer Alina Habba to remain as NJ federal prosecutor
shortDescription: Her tenure thus far has been marked by partisan statements and bringing cases against Democrats.

title: Jerome Powell fact checks President Trump in clash at Federal Reserve
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he won't fire Jerome Powell following a clash at the Federal Reserve that saw the Fed chair correct the president.

title: Powell corrects Trump during Fed visit
shortDescription: President Donald Trump cited the cost of the Federal Reserve’s renovation during a rare visit, prompting Chair Jerome Powell to push back.

title: Trump visits Fed amid Powell feud
shortDescription: President Donald Trump visited the Federal Reserve after accusing Chair Jerome Powell of fraud over renovation costs at its D.C. headquarters.

title: Trump tours Federal Reserve building renovations in Washington
shortDescription: The Trump administration has been critical of the cost of the renovation and Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell.

title: Trump looks to remove homeless people from streets
shortDescription: President Trump wants to make it easier for cities and states to move homeless people to treatment centers under new executive action.

title: Here's where Trump's children have gone to college
shortDescription: All of Donald Trump's four eldest children went to one of two universities. His youngest, Barron Trump, is currently attending New York University.

title: Judge blocks Trump executive order on voting
shortDescription: A federal judge blocked Donald Trump's attempt to require proof of citizenship on voter registration forms.

title: GOP senators call for special counsel to probe Obama and his staff
shortDescription: GOP Sens. Lindsey Graham and John Cornyn are calling for a special counsel to investigate whether Obama was involved in undermining Trump's 2016 bid.

title: 'MAGA all the way': Trump mourns wrestler Hulk Hogan's death
shortDescription: Trump has longstanding ties to professional wrestling and his relationship with Hogan goes back decades.

title: Trump looks to disband homeless camps across US with new order
shortDescription: President Trump wants to make it easier for cities and states to move homeless people to treatment centers under new executive action he's taking.
